ModMetaData.name: Anima Alchemy
ModMetaData.author: TM3
ModMetaData.description: This mod started as an Add-on for the great mod "Elders Faction" by xrushha. It also requires "Anima Gear" as a dependency as it uses the farmable anima fibers for the drug recipes. This is my first try at modding with a shallow programming knowledge at best, so any constructive feedback is welcome. Needless to say it is a work in progress. Enjoy! - Peace
